[Page Title: Grace & Grit - Private Events]

Private Events

ABOUT OUR PRIVATE DINING

At Grace & Grit, fresh local seafood, Lowcountry cuisine and Southern hospitality embody our locally owned and operated Southern establishment. Located just over the bridge in Mt. Pleasant, Grace & Grit features multiple private dining options, with an ideal location, for whatever the occasion. Our spaces are perfect for rehearsal dinners, bridal and baby showers, business dinners with presentations, celebrations and more. We offer a relaxed and inviting atmosphere with exceptional food, drink and service, and look forward to creating a memorable event for you and your guests.

To learn more about our offerings, please contact our Event Coordinator, Eli Kline, at or . She is happy to help create the perfect private event for you and your guests!
(843) 698-4748 eli@gracegrit.com VIEW OUR PRIVATE DINING PDF

Specials
ALL SPECIALS OUR STORY 
Delicious Southern Food & Hospitality.

We're a local, family-run restaurant with a passion for food, our home & community, and of course southern hospitality. Chef owned and driven by Frank Kline, Grace & Grit was opened in August 2017 and focuses on fresh, local seafood and produce, creative & flavorful southern food including our Grit Flight featuring a sampling of our grits, as well as a full bar highlighted by an extensively curated bourbon program.
Our menu Reserve 
We Look Forward to Seeing You

Enjoy dining inside or under the oaks on our dog-friendly patio.

Reviews

Review By - Yelp

K R:

Very lovely staff kind and attentive the food was brought quickly. A good place to go after work for a drink.

Review By - Yelp

T D:

Excellent food, service and atmosphere!! Would recommend dinner on the patio if weather permits! The grits are outstanding and the chefs specials are delicious!!Good luck trying to find a better bourbon selection!This place is the Bourbon Mecca of Mt. Pleasant!!!

Review By - Yelp

Sarah M:

Food, service, and ambiance are always excellent. One of our favorite places in the area!

Review By - Yelp

Denise V:

Everything was so good from the service to the food. Enjoyed the patio seating and then enjoyed drinks at the bar. Fun staff too.

Review By - Yelp

John P:

Excellent food and service. Tasty dishes. Great ambiance. Good drinks. Wedge Salad was well done.
